text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: To solve problems of this kind. Convert the given verbal description into algebric expression.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: 2 pens, 1 pencil costs 2.5 $ . 3 pens, 5 pencils cost 5.5$. What is the cost of 50 pens and 50 pencils

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 25px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Let the cost of pen be x and that of pencil be y.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: so we have (1) equation 2x + y = 2.5 and

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: From here we have to find the values of x and y which satisfy both the above equations

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Now substitute the value of x in any one of the equation, say in (1) y = 2.5 - 2(1) => y = 0.5

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: verdana; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Cost of 50 pens and 50 pencils is 50(1) + 50(1/2) = 75$
